title: Non-Meditation and Natural Wakefulness - The Pema Chodron Foundation
description: An excerpt from talk 1 of Pema Chodron's recent weekend retreat called "Uncovering Natural Wakefulness." In these talks, Ani Pema introduces the basic principles of meditation and non-meditation as well as guided meditation sessions, questions and answers, and experiential exercises.
